title: Choosing what to buy
creator_credit: Howard Potter, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and H S Potter Productions
brief_description: Uses animation, song, puppetry and pantomime to illustrate basic economic concepts for spending money wisely. Deals with the problems of limited resources and unlimited wants, opportunity cost, and the importance of rational decision making in the market place. Suitable for primary school level.
